price: Kuma suna tambayar ka daga zulƙarnaini*, ka ce: "Zan karanta muku ambato daga gare shi."
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا
footnotes: * Zulƙarnaini an ce sarki ne yanã bin shari'ar lbrãhĩm, ga hannunsa ya musulunta sunansa Askandar. Haliru wazirin sane yanã tafiya a gaban yãƙinsa, kuma ɗan innarsa, watau ɗan khãlarsa ne. Shi ne ya gĩna Askandariyya. Sai dai ga maganar akwai warware jũna. Allah Ya sani. Abin da ke a gabãninmu a nan shĩ ne sanin cħwa Allah Yã bã shi mulki, ya kõ yi shĩ bisa sharĩ'a, ya yi ƙarfi, da ƙarfin Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
